channel.description:
Welcome Moparscape.
This Is My Third Topic Ive Done About My Server. _First Post [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541372.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541372.0.html[/url] _Second Post [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541772.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541772.0.html[/url] _The Server Is Based On Delta And I Used This Blank Source: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=536332.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=536332.0[/url]
The Server Has Loads Of New Features Now Including The Following: Ill Start With The 100% Things:
100% Godsword Stance - Ill Upload A Picture 100% Godsword Correct Hits - Ill Upload A Picture 100% Godsword Running - Ill Upload Picture 100% Skills Complete - Even Slayer! 100% Slayer Tower With Correct Npc's - No Bugs What So Ever [ That Im Aware Of :) ] 100% Trading With No Dupes - Dupes Fixed Like The Trade Accept The Quickly Decline Is Patched [ I Swear Down But It Was Hard ] 100% Banking - You Cant Move Whilst In Bank Now [ Promise This Feature ] 100% Minigames - I Got To Add Teleports Yet Though 100% Old RuneScape Login Screen! - Credit To Rs2Bulldog As I Ripped It From His Server 100% 2006 Gameframe - Credit Once Again To Rs2Bulldog From His Client 100% Running - When It Laggs [ If It Does ] You Can No Longer NoClip Any Where You Want To 100% Anti-NoClip - Auto Banned [ Ripped This From Ddsspeced I Think - Credit To Jayden ] 100% Proper Home Teleport
Next The 1 - 100%
60% Shops - Little Buggy And Player Stock Doesnt Work 80% Npc V Player [ NvP ] Combat - Melee / Mage / Range [ Getting There! ] 90% Lagg Free [ Sometimes Freezes At The Skilling Area - No Idea Why? ] 50% Pking - All Right Zones [ Even PK Box ] Just No Wild Zones Yet [ Im Starting It Now Hopefully ]
Thanks For Viewing Ill Upload Some Pictures ASAP - Im Busy Right Now
No Hate Comments - Nice Only If You Dont Like This Then Go Away!

item.title: BentonScape | 2006 Game Frame | Welcome Screen | 474 Loaded | Skills 100% |
item.dc:creator: @BentonSoft BentonSoft
item.description:
@BentonSoft wrote:

Welcome Moparscape.

This Is My Third Topic Ive Done About My Server.
_First Post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541372.0.html
_Second Post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,541772.0.html
_The Server Is Based On Delta And I Used This Blank Source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=536332.0

The Server Has Loads Of New Features Now Including The Following:
Ill Start With The 100% Things:

100% Godsword Stance - Ill Upload A Picture
100% Godsword Correct Hits - Ill Upload A Picture
100% Godsword Running - Ill Upload Picture
100% Skills Complete - Even Slayer!
100% Slayer Tower With Correct Npc’s - No Bugs What So Ever [ That Im Aware Of ]
100% Trading With No Dupes - Dupes Fixed Like The Trade Accept The Quickly Decline Is Patched [ I Swear Down But It Was Hard ]
100% Banking - You Cant Move Whilst In Bank Now [ Promise This Feature ]
100% Minigames - I Got To Add Teleports Yet Though
100% Old RuneScape Login Screen! - Credit To Rs2Bulldog As I Ripped It From His Server
100% 2006 Gameframe - Credit Once Again To Rs2Bulldog From His Client
100% Running - When It Laggs [ If It Does ] You Can No Longer NoClip Any Where You Want To
100% Anti-NoClip - Auto Banned [ Ripped This From Ddsspeced I Think - Credit To Jayden ]
100% Proper Home Teleport

Next The 1 - 100%

60% Shops - Little Buggy And Player Stock Doesnt Work
80% Npc V Player [ NvP ] Combat - Melee / Mage / Range [ Getting There! ]
90% Lagg Free [ Sometimes Freezes At The Skilling Area - No Idea Why? ]
50% Pking - All Right Zones [ Even PK Box ] Just No Wild Zones Yet [ Im Starting It Now Hopefully ]

Thanks For Viewing Ill Upload Some Pictures ASAP - Im Busy Right Now

No Hate Comments - Nice Only
If You Dont Like This Then Go Away!

Read full topic
